name: Andrew Blass
text: Wow, I was very happy with the food and service, not only was it fast, but the food was excellent, exactly what I ordered and better than any other time I've ordered from other locations. I would definitely recommend ordering from this location!

name: Brianne Deck
text: Very disappointed this was delivered to us this way. We always order and wow.  Glad they are making it right but now half the family has to wait to eat

name: Brayden Ostrum
text: I have always gone there as a kid and since my last order i was super impressed the delivery drivers are super chill and nice and one forgot me and my friends drinks but that was okay the pizza is dynamite the nice garlic flavored crust â€¦More

name: Karen Chandler
text: Good foldovers and pizza. Their crust toppers are great

name: Tricia Patterson
text: Fast friendly service and fresh pizza!

name: Vicki Smith
text: In my neighborhood  staff very nice polite

name: Airick Klann
text: Great pizza, great employees that go above and beyond. When then website malfunctions, they make sure you get what you were trying to order. They let you customize your   pizza however you want without complaint. They get along in the â€¦More

name: Jo VondenBenken
text: Walked in and ordered food.  Recieved my pizza no problem.  Ordered a baked sub and recieved wings instead, now I have nothing to eat.  Awesome!

name: J Crawford
text: Great pizza. Always friendly people, and a quick trip from home. They've got some awesome speciality pizzas too.  Make sure to give it a try. Also great deals and solid prices.

name: Loren Ruiz
text: This franchise overcharges on delivery and that's why they can't keep delivery drivers who wants to tip when they have a surcharge of 5$ for delivery. It's a joke.

name: Terry Sanders
text: Great tasting and hot, two of us eating a large be pizza and only two pieces left

name: Brenda Dibble
text: Very good!! Love the flavored crust, the subs and the cookie!!

name: Ralph Morton III
text: Love this place go there at least 3 times a week great food even better staff. Every trip there is a delight. And when I get delivery it is always polite prompt service.

name: Nathan Robertstad
text: Iâ€™m traveling from out of town and I had an odd request and the guys were willing to help me out.  Jimmy and Terry, sorry if thatâ€™s not the two Guysâ€™s names, were awesome.  Thanks for helping me out.

text: Didn't get my sauce or toppings I wanted

text: My kids love their food the way they make the pizza they say it's the best tasting pizza ever

name: william short
text: As always they were promp, polite and the pizza was exactly how i ordered it.great job!  - bill/Adrian,Mi.

name: Sherman Worley Sr
text: Very tasty

name: Ed Perkins
text: Nice people. Great service.  Pizza was average, no better than Pizza Hut's.  Couldn't taste the sauce.  Toppings unevenly distributed on the pie.  Could have used some more cheese.

name: Richard Payne III
text: Good product, fair price.

name: Michael O'Brian Sr
text: Good food, just a bit pricey.  Like everywhere else in town.

name: Ann Pyzik
text: Used to love it but now it's gone to the capper. Won't be going back. I know that losing one customer isn't going to hurt them at all but it's the truth. Manager is very rude and last few times the order has been wrong.

name: Jennifer Dunn
text: Excellent pizza and I love the flavored crust. The service and management was awesome.

name: Kyle Schadewald
text: Love hungry Howie's pizza OMG love them was just to gooooood to be true!!!

name: Marq Hicks
text: Good pizza. I have been there a dozen times and have never seen anyone wash their hands....and they don't wear gloves so....

name: Yvonne Myers
text: Great food and service!  First time ever here!

name: Andrea Deck
text: Changed my rating because the new owner Julie, is a horrible manager!  Maybe if you wanted to keep employees you should learn how to run a business.  Bad management = no employees.  Also pretty sure having your employees sign a release â€¦More

name: Paul Schwen
text: I'm traveling through the area on business and ordered the 'Howie Maui' pizza - I've had a lot of pizza in my 60+ years, this is quite honestly the VERY BEST pizza I've ever tasted or eaten in my entire life. The bill was surprisingly low â€¦More

name: Patrick Dunn
text: I won a contest from Hungry Howies and they gave me 52 coupons for FREE large one topping pizzas. Doesn't get better than that! I absolutely love their pizza and the staff is very friendly every time I'm there.

name: wesley knotts
text: Hungry howies of adrian donated two large supreme stuffed crust pizza to Adrian Hope center for the homelass yesterday, they are great and i didnt want that to go un noticed.

name: Manda Braman
text: Our favorite pizza in town. Love the flavored crust. Deals & delivery always good.

name: Craig Rosacrans
text: Best pizza and crust ever.

name: Sarah Byrd
text: Their pizza is always good. Not too doughy or tough.  Their crust is delicious and they never hold back on the cheese.

name: Alyssa Hamilton
text: Amazing customer service, the lady who wrung me out was so polite and cheerful.

name: John Miller
text: Always love their selections.  Great pie!

name: Bystander
text: Everytime i come into town i have to stop here and get myself a calzone. Great prices and food is always good.

text: The web site was messed up so had to order there and of course it cost more than if I could've ordered on line. Then the pizza was way overcooked! Used to be our favorite pizza but very disappointed this time!!!

text: Picked my pizza up about 20 minutes after I ordered. The pizza was somewhat cold, the crust was hard. Worst pizza I've ever had from Hungry Howies . Now I know why everyone gets their pizza from the Hudson Hungry Howies.
